verses.text: Great \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* greatly \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* praised, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* city \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7141"\w* holy mountain.

Beautiful \w in|strong="H3068"\w* elevation, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* whole earth, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* Zion, \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* north sides, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* King.
God \w has|strong="H4428"\w* shown himself \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* citadels \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge.
\w For|strong="H3045"\w*, behold, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* kings assembled \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w*, \w they|strong="H3045"\w* passed by together.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* amazed. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* dismayed. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* hurried \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

Trembling took hold \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, pain, \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w in|strong="H7200"\w* travail.
\w With|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* east wind, \w you|strong="H3205"\w* break \w the|strong="H3205"\w* ships \w of|strong="H3205"\w* Tarshish.

As \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have heard, \w so|strong="H7307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have seen, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* Armies, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* our God. God \w will|strong="H7307"\w* establish \w it|strong="H7665"\w* forever. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* thought \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving kindness, \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* middle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* temple.

\w As|strong="H2617"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* name, God, so \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* praise \w to|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* ends \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth. \w Your|strong="H7130"\w* right hand \w is|strong="H2617"\w* full \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w Mount|strong="H4390"\w* Zion \w be|strong="H8034"\w* glad! \w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Judah rejoice \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* judgements.
Walk \w about|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* go around \w her|strong="H1323"\w*. Number its towers.

Notice \w her|strong="H5608"\w* bulwarks. Consider \w her|strong="H5608"\w* palaces, that \w you|strong="H6726"\w* may \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w it|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* next generation.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* \w this|strong="H4616"\w* God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* God \w forever|strong="H1755"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* ever. \w He|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* guide even \w to|strong="H3820"\w* death.
